text: atev hamane tumhen ek aise samudaay mein bheja hai jisase pahale kitane hee samudaay guzar chuke hai, taaki hamane tumhaaree or jo prakaashana kee hai, use unako suna do, yadyapi ve rahamaan ke saath inakaar kee neeti apanae hue hai. kah do, "vahee mera rab hai. usake siva koee poojy-prabhu nahin. usee par mera bharosa hai aur usee kee or mujhe palatakar jaana hai.
